00016 package WeBWorK::Utils::Tasks;
00017 use base qw(Exporter);
00018 
00019 =head1 NAME
00020 
00021 WeBWorK::Utils::Tasks - utilities for doing single tasks, like rendering a
00022 problem by itself.
00023 
00024 =head1 SYNOPSIS
00025 
00026  use WeBWorK::Utils::Tasks qw(renderProblems);
00027 
00028 =head1 DESCRIPTION
00029 
00030 This module provides functions for rendering html from files outside the normal
00031 context of being for a particular user in an existing problem set.
00032 
00033 It also provides functions which are useful for taking problems which are not
00034 part of any set and making live versions of them, or loading them into the
00035 editor.
00036 
00037 =cut
00038 
00039 # Ultimately, this may provide functions for turning problems into hardcopy or
00040 # other tasks that can be separated out of specific content managers.
00041 
00042 use strict;
00043 use warnings;
00044 use Carp;
00045 use WeBWorK::PG; 
00046 use WeBWorK::PG::ImageGenerator; 
00047 use WeBWorK::DB::Utils qw(global2user); 
00048 use WeBWorK::Form;
00049 
00050 our @EXPORT    = ();
00051 our @EXPORT_OK = qw(
00052     renderProblems
00053     fake_set
00054     fake_set_version
00055     fake_problem
00056     fake_user
00057 );
00058 
00059 use constant fakeSetName => "Undefined_Set";
00060 use constant fakeUserName => "Undefined_User";
00061 
00062 =head1 FUNCTIONS
00063 
00064 =over
00065 
00066 =item fake_set
00067 
00068  fake_set($db);
00069 
00070 Given a database, make a temporary problem set for that database.
00071 
00072 =cut
00073 
00074 sub fake_set { 
00075     my $db = shift; 
00076  
00077     my $set = $db->newGlobalSet(); 
00078     $set = global2user($db->{set_user}->{record}, $set); 
00079     $set->psvn(123); 
00080     $set->set_id(fakeSetName); 
00081     $set->open_date(time());
00082     $set->due_date(time());
00083     $set->answer_date(time());
00084     $set->visible(0);
00085     $set->enable_reduced_scoring(0);
00086     $set->hardcopy_header("defaultHeader");
00087     return($set); 
00088 } 
00089 
00090 sub fake_set_version { 
00091     my $db = shift; 
00092  
00093     my $set = $db->newSetVersion(); 
00094     # $set = global2user($db->{set_user}->{record}, $set); 
00095     $set->psvn(123); 
00096     $set->set_id(fakeSetName); 
00097     $set->open_date(time());
00098     $set->due_date(time());
00099     $set->answer_date(time());
00100     $set->visible(0);
00101     $set->enable_reduced_scoring(); 
00102     $set->hardcopy_header("defaultHeader");
00103     $set->version_id(1);
00104     $set->attempts_per_version(0);
00105     $set->problem_randorder(0);
00106     $set->problems_per_page(0);
00107     $set->hide_score('N');
00108     $set->hide_score_by_problem('N');
00109     $set->hide_work('N');
00110     $set->restrict_ip('No');
00111 
00112     return($set); 
00113 } 
00114 
00115 
00116 =item fake_problem
00117 
00118  fake_problem($db);
00119  fake_problem($db, problem_seed=>$seed);
00120 
00121 Make a temporary problem for the given database. If a problem seed is not
00122 specified, 0 is used.
00123 
00124 =cut
00125 
00126 sub fake_problem { 
00127     my $db = shift; 
00128     my %options = @_;
00129     my $problem = $db->newGlobalProblem(); 
00130     $problem = global2user($db->{problem_user}->{record}, $problem); 
00131     $problem->set_id(fakeSetName); 
00132     $problem->value(""); 
00133     $problem->max_attempts("-1"); 
00134  
00135     $problem->problem_seed(0); 
00136     $problem->problem_seed($options{'problem_seed'})
00137          if(defined($options{'problem_seed'}));
00138 
00139     $problem->status(0);
00140     $problem->sub_status(0); 
00141     $problem->attempted(0); 
00142     $problem->last_answer(""); 
00143     $problem->num_correct(0); 
00144     $problem->num_incorrect(0); 
00145     return($problem); 
00146 }
00147 
00148 =item fake_user
00149 
00150  fake_user($db);
00151 
00152 Make a temporary user for the given database.
00153 
00154 =cut
00155 
00156 sub fake_user {
00157     my ($db) = @_;
00158     return $db->newUser(
00159         user_id => fakeUserName,
00160         first_name=>'',
00161         last_name=>'',
00162         email_address=>'',
00163         student_id=>'',
00164         section=>'',
00165         recitation=>'',
00166         comment=>'',
00167     );
00168 }
00169 
00170 =item render_problems
00171 
00172  render_problems(r => $r, user => $User, problem_list => \@problem_list);
00173 
00174 Given an Apache request object, the current user, and a list of problem files,
00175 return a list of WeBWorK::PG objects which contain rendered versions of the
00176 problems.
00177 
00178 Options:
00179 
00180 =over
00181 
00182 =item r
00183 
00184 A WeBWorK::Request object. Required.
00185 
00186 =item problem_list
00187 
00188 A reference to an array of items render. Required. Each item can either be a
00189 string, which is interpreted as a path to a PG file, or a reference to a string,
00190 which is interpreted as a complete PG program.
00191 
00192 =item user
00193 
00194 A User record (e.g. a WeBWorK::DB::Record::User object). Optional. If not
00195 specified, fake_user() will be used to generate a temporary user record.
00196 
00197 =item this_set
00198 
00199 A Set record (e.g. a WeBWorK::DB::Record::UserSet object). Optional. If not
00200 specified, fake_set() will be used to generate a temporary set record.
00201 
00202 =item problem_seed
00203 
00204 The seed to use for randomization. Optional. If not specified, the Request
00205 object will be checked for a problem_seed parameter. If found, that value is
00206 used. Otherwise, 0 is used.
00207 
00208 =item displayMode
00209 
00210 The display mode to use. Optional. If not specified, the Request object will be
00211 checked for a displayMode parameter. If found, that value is used. Otherwise,
00212 the default display mode is used.
00213 
00214 If the value is 'None', then problems will not be rendered and "fake"
00215 WeBWorK::PG objects will be returned. Each "fake" WeBWorK::PG object will look
00216 like:
00217 
00218  {body_text=>''}
00219 
00220 =item showHints
00221 
00222 Whether to show hints in the problem. Optional. If not specified, hints are not
00223 shown.
00224 
00225 =item showSolutions
00226 
00227 Whether to show solutions in the problem. Optional. If not specified, solutions
00228 are not shown.
00229 
00230 =item problemNumber
00231 
00232 Each problem in @problem_list is given a problem ID starting with this value.
00233 Optional. If not specified the problems are numbered from 1.
00234 
00235 =back
00236 
00237 =cut
00238 
00239 sub renderProblems {
00240     my %args = @_;
00241     my $r = $args{r};
00242     my $db = $r->db;
00243     my $ce = $r->ce; 
00244 
00245     # Don't print file names as part of the problem to avoid redundant 
00246     # paths in Library Browser and Homework Sets editor
00247     $ce->{pg}->{specialPGEnvironmentVars}->{PRINT_FILE_NAMES_FOR}=[];
00248 
00249     my @problem_list = @{$args{problem_list}};
00250     my $displayMode = $args{displayMode}
00251         || $r->param('displayMode')
00252         || $ce->{pg}{options}{displayMode};
00253     
00254     # special case for display mode 'None' -- we don't have to do anything
00255     # FIXME i think this should be handled in SetMaker.pm
00256     if ($displayMode eq 'None') {
00257         return map { {body_text=>''} } @problem_list;
00258     }
00259     
00260     my $user = $args{user} || fake_user($db);
00261     my $set = $args{'this_set'} || fake_set($db);
00262     my $problem_seed = $args{'problem_seed'} || $r->param('problem_seed') || 0;
00263     my $showHints = $args{showHints} || 0;
00264     my $showSolutions = $args{showSolutions} || 0;
00265     my $problemNumber = $args{'problem_number'} || 1;
00266     
00267     my $key = $r->param('key');
00268     
00269     # remove any pretty garbage around the problem
00270     local $ce->{pg}{specialPGEnvironmentVars}{problemPreamble} = {TeX=>'',HTML=>''};
00271     local $ce->{pg}{specialPGEnvironmentVars}{problemPostamble} = {TeX=>'',HTML=>''};
00272     my $problem = fake_problem($db, 'problem_seed'=>$problem_seed);
00273     my $formFields = { WeBWorK::Form->new_from_paramable($r)->Vars };
00274     
00275     my @output;
00276     
00277     foreach my $onefile (@problem_list) {
00278         my $translationOptions = {
00279             displayMode     => $displayMode,
00280             showHints       => $showHints,
00281             showSolutions   => $showSolutions,
00282             refreshMath2img => 0,
00283             processAnswers  => 0,
00284         };
00285         
00286         $problem->problem_id($problemNumber++);
00287         if (ref $onefile) {
00288             $problem->source_file('');
00289             $translationOptions->{r_source} = $onefile;
00290         } else {
00291             $problem->source_file($onefile);
00292         }
00293         
00294         my $pg = new WeBWorK::PG(
00295             $ce,
00296             $user,
00297             $key,
00298             $set,
00299             $problem,
00300             123, # PSVN (practically unused in PG)
00301             $formFields,
00302             $translationOptions,
00303         );
00304 
00305         push @output, $pg;
00306     }
00307     
00308     return @output;
00309 }
00310 
00311 =back
00312 
00313 =cut
